name: Salesforce Certified Administrator (SCA)
description: Certification demonstrating ability to configure and manage Salesforce applications, user management, and security settings.

name: Salesforce Certified Platform Developer I
description: Foundation certification validating knowledge of building custom applications on the Salesforce Platform using Apex and Visualforce.

name: Salesforce Certified Platform App Builder
description: Certification validating skills in designing, building, and implementing custom applications using declarative capabilities.

name: Salesforce Certified Associate
description: Entry-level certification demonstrating understanding of Salesforce fundamentals and cloud concepts.

name: Salesforce Certified AI Associate
description: Certification demonstrating knowledge of AI capabilities within the Salesforce ecosystem.

name: Salesforce Certified Marketing Cloud Administrator
description: Certification validating skills in administering and managing Salesforce Marketing Cloud.

name: Salesforce Certified Sales Cloud Consultant
description: Certification demonstrating expertise in designing and implementing Sales Cloud solutions.

name: Salesforce Certified AI Specialist
description: Advanced certification in Salesforce AI technologies and implementation.
